notes: Post-pigeonhole wiring: the simple argument (PSD trace bound + averaging) replaces the interlacing families machinery. GPL-H closed for K_n, empirically verified for general graphs.

nodes.body_text: Problem 6: find universal c>0 s.t. for every graph G and eps in (0,1), exists S with |S|>=c*eps*n and L_S<=eps*L.
Heavy/light decomposition: edges with tau_e>eps are heavy. At most (n-1)/eps heavy edges. Turan gives independent set I0 with |I0|>=eps*n/3, no internal heavy edges.
Leverage degree filter: remove v from I0 with ell_v > C_lev/eps. Markov keeps |I0'|>=eps*n/12. All internal edges light (tau<=eps), leverage degrees bounded.
Barrier greedy: build S by adding vertices one at a time from I0', maintaining ||M_t||<eps. At step t, need exists v with ||Y_t(v)||<1 where Y_t(v)=H^{-1/2}C_t(v)H^{-1/2}.
SIMPLE PROOF: (1) For PSD Y: ||Y||<=tr(Y). (2) Pigeonhole: min_v tr(Y_v) <= avg = dbar. (3) If dbar<1 then exists v with ||Y_v||<=tr(Y_v)<=dbar<1. No interlacing families needed.
K_n dbar bound (proved exactly): dbar_t = 2t/(n*eps). At T=eps*n/3 steps: dbar=2/3<1. Gives |S|=eps*n/3, c=1/3. Problem 6 CLOSED for K_n.

General dbar bound: at M_t!=0, dbar_t = (1/r_t)*tr(H_t^{-1}*M_cross). Naive bound gives dbar<=O(1/eps^2), exceeds 1. Greedy keeps dbar<=0.641 empirically. Formal bound at M_t!=0 is the SINGLE remaining gap.
Q-polynomial roots: Q(x)=(1/r)sum det(xI-Y_v) has max real root<0.505 across 440 steps. If Q has nonneg real roots, max root<=sum roots=dbar<1 by Vieta. Independent confirmation.
Exhaustive numerics: 440 nontrivial steps, n in [8,64], 5 graph families, 5 eps values. dbar<1 at ALL steps (max 0.641). Pigeonhole verified 440/440. PSD trace bound verified 440/440.
SUPERSEDED: interlacing families (MSS), Borcea-Branden real stability, Bonferroni eigenvalue bounds, AR-NT ratio certificates, GL-Balance â€” all bypassed by the elementary pigeonhole argument.
Alternative path (random sampling): p=eps gives P(||M_S||<=eps AND |S|>=eps*n/6)>0 for all tested graphs (272 combos). Formal matrix concentration proof open.
Result: K_n proved (c=1/3). General graphs: single gap is formal dbar<1 bound at M_t!=0. Empirical margin 36%. Size is eps^2*n/36 (eps^2 bottleneck from Turan).
